snippet.title: Game & Watch - Donkey Kong 3 (Micro Vs. System) (c)1984 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
While not sold under the Game & Watch brand the Micro Vs. System titles are widely considered to be part of that series.  The units are designed for 1 or 2 players, with Game B being the 2 player game.  This is Donkey Kong 3 for the Micro Vs. System running in MAME.  The emulation was done by Algestam using a unit provided by Ryan Holtz, while the artwork was provided by DarthMarino.  

Artwork can be found at https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY
